interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.CurrentAirQuality
interface.description: This interface provides capability to represent current value of air quality.

property.name: CurrentValue
property.description: The current value of air quality.

property.name: MinValue
property.description: The minimum value allowed for CurrentValue.

property.name: MaxValue
property.description: The maximum value allowed for CurrentValue.

property.name: Precision
property.description: The precision of the CurrentValue property. i.e. the number of ug/m3 or ppm the actual power consumption must change before CurrentValue is updated.

property.name: UpdateMinTime
property.description: The minimum time between updates of the CurrentValue property in milliseconds.
